CustomField.description: Check expired date in last 6 months (183 days)
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( SBQQ__EndDate__c >= TODAY() - 183, SBQQ__EndDate__c <= TODAY()), TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check expired date in last 6 months (183 days)
